property.name: dfs.data.dir
property.description: Determines where on the local filesystem an DFS data node should store its blocks. If this is a comma-delimited list of directories, then data will be stored in all named directories, typically on different devices.

property.name: mapred.local.dir
property.description: The local directory where MapReduce stores intermediate data files. May be a comma-separated list of directories on different devices in order to spread disk i/o.

property.name: mapred.system.dir
property.description: The shared directory where MapReduce stores control files.

property.name: mapred.temp.dir
property.description: A shared directory for temporary files.
